phrases: Thanks to you, I have awakened.
This time for sure, see.
So now I have a favor to ask of my partner.
Do you mind?
Let us hear it.
Could you buy me just a little bit of time?
There is something I want to try out.
All right.
I will see what I can do.
But...
I cannot sustain it for too long.
Well, well, Gluhen Rose, what are you doing here by yourself?
Never Back Down
Surely you are not planning to take us on alone?
Is that a problem?
I see we are being grossly underestimated.
Yes...
What a sad thought, Shenyun.
If I were you, I would not underestimate me too much, either!
Burst into bloom, Ranunculus!
I see.
So she was after the talismans.
But are you sure about this?
Can you protect your partner while you are focusing on that move?
I will not let you get in Ayato's way!
All right, then what do you say to this?
Go!
So it is an illusion!
I see.
Letting the illusion go past is a wise way to endure them.
All right, then I will take this opportunity to target your partner.
Sorry...
Damn!
Of course it hurts.
That is where I got a direct hit on you with my Gossamer Attack earlier.
You know how you should be aware of your opponent's breathing
and smallest gestures during a battle?
You expand your senses to your surroundings, not only your opponent.
Well, under the Amagiri Shinmei Style, we call this state VijNna.
VijNna...
Since humans tend to hit a wall when their outlook grows narrow,
it is important to look at all kinds of things from all kinds of angles.
Why did not you go after my badge?
My aim was a little off, that is all.
I see!
Then I am going to make you regret it!
Come out...
Semiserrata!
You are blowing yourself up?!
I really wanted to keep this under wraps a little longer, but...
So you can resist your own powers.
Really, now, I am astonished!
The rumors do not do you justice, Gluhen Rose.
You were too careless just now, Shenhua.
I am sorry, Shenyun.
What do you say we wrap this up now?
I do need to thank you for making me break out in a cold sweat.
What is wrong, Gluhen Rose?!
Are not you going to fight back?!
What a one-sided attack!
B-But...
since she is unable to move, should not she just target her badge?
This is way too...
Looks like she is trying to win by rendering her unconscious.
But I can see that Shenyun is holding back somewhat in her attack.
Apparently, she does not intend to let her black out so easily.
You love to feel pain, do not you?!
Ayato!
When you are in trouble, you should lean on someone else.
Aside from me, I am sure there are other people who would help you out.
Well, then,
who is going to protect you?
Look at you now!
Why do not we end this now,
Gluhen Rose?!
What is going on?
Sorry to keep you waiting, Julis.
You are late, Ayato!
Were you able to break the seal completely?
No.
I just managed to get to the second level, I think.
And it is not like it gave me a power-up or anything.
But this amount of Prana...
It is just that I can store all my leaked Prana internally now.
But I think it is extended my limit by that much.
How long do you think you will last?
Let us see...
Probably over an hour.
I see.
In that case, can I leave the rest to you?
To be honest, I have reached my own limit.
Sure.
You two are one surprise after another, are not you?
Now, then...
All right.
Impossible... you can see them, then?
In that case...
What do say to this?!
What the...
Amagiri Shinmei Style Hidden Technique...
Banish Evil Spirits...
No way...
Now that it is come to this...
That is an explosive sphere woven from all the talismans I had!
Hope you enjoy it!
Needless to say, this is an illusion.
Only one is genuine.
Well, I am sure you can see right through them now...
But what about this one?
Ayato!
Do not worry about me!
Just focus on getting her!
Would you mind keeping quiet for a minute, Gluhen Rose?!
Ayato!
True to form to the bitter end, huh, Shenyun Li?
That is right!
That is what I like to see, Murakumo!
Both of you can just get blasted to hell!
There is no need to dodge.
What the...
I-Impossible...
I have to say, you did piss me off a little.
So at least let me do that.
Shenyun Li has lost consciousness!
Therefore, Ayato Amagiri and Julis-Alexia von Riessfeld are your winners!
Now that was an enjoyable match!
Ayato Amagiri...
I would be thrilled to meet you.
Congratulations, Your Highness!
Mr. Amagiri!
You were totally, totally amazing!
I was so excited!
Thanks,
Flora.
Calm down a bit, Flora.
I see you are as spunky as usual, Flora.
That sets my mind at ease.
Did you know Flora from before, Claudia?
Yes, I have met her as Julis's maid-in-waiting several times.
Lady Enfield is always so kind!
- I see. - Now, then...
Congratulations to you both on reaching the semifinals.
Seidoukan Academy has more points than we would projected.
As a representative of the school, I would like to express my joy and gratitude.
Hey, it is nothing you need to thank us for.
Of course,
I would like to express my heartfelt congratulations and gratitude to you,
not just as a representative of the school, but personally, as well.
Now, then, please come to my room tonight.
- Come along! - H-Hey, wait!
Right, then!
Away we go!
H-Hold up!
What kind of proposition is that, all of a sudden?!
In order to restore Ayato's vitality before tomorrow's semifinal match,
I have prepared to offer him some hospitality.
Do not just drag him away like that!
Ayato and I are going to discuss our strategy for tomorrow!
No, no, what Ayato needs right now is rest!
- No way!
Strategy meeting! -
It is not fair, Julis!
H-Hey, come on... both of you!
This year's Festa has a greater popularity than we expected.
At this point,
we have already surpassed last year's figures for both the box office and attendance.
Permitting Arlequint's surrogates to compete was a masterstroke!
Haruka's younger brother, huh?
What?
No, never mind.
Thank you for your report.
Excuse me, sir.
Now, then...
On to the semifinals!
What is that?
This is my good luck charm.
It is a magical ticket that will grant you any wish you desire.
How wonderful!
Oh, then were you just wishing for victory in today's match?
No.
This is just a good luck charm.
Today's victory is something you and I are going to achieve on our own.
You are right.
Sorry about that.
Kirin?
Uh, yes?
What is it?
Thank you.
What?
Wh-What is this, all of a sudden?
I only made it this far because of you.
I am grateful for that.
P-Please!
Do not say things like that!
I am the one who should be thanking you.
Because my wish to save my father is about to come true.
Your father...
This is something I want you to know, Kirin.
Yes?
My father lost most of his body in an accident at the lab where he worked.
Fortunately, his brain was unscathed,
so now he is hooked up to the nerve center in the workshop he built at home.
You do not have to feel bad for him.
Now that he is free to research what he wants to,
my father says he is happier.
What he wants to?
Making guns for me.
For you, Saya?
That is right.
So in a way, what Camilla Pareto said was on the mark.
Because this power was not created for others, but for me alone.
And that is precisely why I cannot forgive anyone who would reject that notion.
Hey, there, girls!
Long time no see!
What do you want?
Oh, my, that is pretty cold!
Camilla says there is something she just has to tell you before the match, so...
It is been a long time, Saya Sasamiya.
What can I say?
It seems that I misread you slightly,
so I thought I would tell you.
Misread me?
Yes, I realized it when I saw your match.
When viewed separately, those Luxes of yours are all defective.
But when you look at them, including yourself, as a single weapon,
I must admit that they are without peer.
Then...
However...
That actually means they are prone to causing more organic instability.
Like I said, they are not for actual combat.
Then, I will make you acknowledge them by taking out your clones.
That is impossible.
S-Saya!
That said...
If, by any chance, you two should win,
I will take back what I said the other day.
Ferrovius and I have poured
all the technology we have developed into AR-D and RM-C's equipment.
So if you do manage to defeat them,
I cannot say your Luxes are not suited for actual combat.
See ya!
Let us go, Kirin.
Right!
Listen to me!
We are going to grant you...
a one-minute grace period today, too!
There it is!
He said it again!
AR-D's trademark declaration!
After making this same declaration in all of their matches,
they have won within approximately one minute!
A team that is reached the quarterfinals and is also riding a wave of momentum...
Let us see if the Sasamiya-Toudou duo can hold its own here, too!
- Kirin, I am leaving that one to you.
- Right.
You show them a thing or two.
Phoenix Festa Semifinals, Match 1...
Battle start!
Kirin Toudou... here I go!
Kirin Toudou, huh?
What about it?
If your intent is to breach my defensive barrier,
then it would make sense for Saya Sasamiya to take me on with her Lux.
This is just my advice.
You can switch now, or else launch a two-pronged attack
Then...
Would you like to try me?
Whether or not this Senbakiri and I are no match for you...
Please find out yourself.
Very well.
If you insist, then go ahead and try it.
It is futile.
So long as you are human, you can never hope to surpass me in terms of reflexes.
I see, now it is clear.
That is enough for me.
Did not you hear me say it was futile?
What?!
Whoa, whoa!
How incredible is that?!
At last, at last,
AR-D has come under attack for the first time in this tournament!
Ridiculous...
It is not possible!
Please take back what you said earlier.
What?
And let us fight fair and square.
What is that supposed to mean?
Please do not mock us...
That is what I mean.
If you are planning to keep that up until the end...
I will put an end to it with my next strike.
C-Can you believe it?!
Now AR-D's on the attack!
It is been 56 seconds since his declaration!
The minute is not up yet!
Splendid!
As far as this matter is concerned, you have defeated me soundly.
Allow me to retract what I said!
If you do not mind, I would like you to explain to me what kind of technique that was.
It worked because you are a machine.
What does that mean?
You used my data and movements to predict how I would attack,
and threw up that defensive barrier, did not you?
Yes, that is exactly right.
The Toudou Style features a technique
in which you lead your opponent on by reading the breathing,
sight lines, distance and muscle movements.
When two experienced swordsmen meet in battle,
they try to get various reads on each other in a split second.
But because you are a machine, you tend to merely react to my movements.
In other words, your lack of combat experience is fatal!
That is my Kirin.
I do not understand it.
The fact that you did not launch a single attack during this minute.
Would not it be fair to say that you are the ones mocking us?
All I wanted was to fight you when you were going all-out.
Otherwise...
it would be pointless for me.
41-type Lux, Twin Particle Cannons, Waldenholt!
Burst.
YOU-Unbelievable!
A single shot from Sasamiya ends in a clean hit against RM-C!
As you can see, I am ready to go, too.
Give me your best shot.
Both Lady Sasamiya and Lady Toudou are amazing!
Hey.
Now, then, Ayato,
if you are spent from fighting, come to my room...
Just you and me...
- Kaboom! - Oh, my!
This is how you greedily usurp what little screen time Enfield has...
Episode 17 The Tyrants Puppet Strings
As Ayato's childhood friend, I am the true heroine!
